name: LIMINAL SPACE (ErenJeager)
description:
LIMINAL SPACE

We met here years ago. Do you remember? Now you are in so much pain. I'm trying to find you. Even though it hurts me so much.

Made in 72 hours for GameDev.tv GameJam. 

Theme

Death is only beginning!

Mission

Go through the sections one by one. Fully experience the vaporwave feeling with vapor music in liminal spaces. Reach the mall!

Team (1 person)

Developer, Designer, 3D Artist: Eren Alkan

Controllers

Movement: W-A-S-D

Interaction: Left Click - "E" Key

Extra Download Link

Dropbox

Thanks for playing!
